notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

body.p: The following Scandinavians bought or sold real estate in Chicago recently:
Adolph P. Scheninger to Christine A. Anderson: Winnemac and Ashland Avenues. Price, 1,000.
Adolph P. Scheninger to Christine A. Anderson: Winthrop and Granville Avenues. Price, $16,000.
John C. Andersen to Wm. C. Hansen: Belle Plaine and Southport Avenues. Price, $36,000.
N. J. Reynertson to Otto C. Westphal: Avers and Fullerton Avenues. Price, $5,800.
Lars A. Kroghnes to L. L. Lohr: Bloomingdale and Sawyer Avenues. Price, $1,800.

Louis M. Nelson to T. J. O'Rourke: North 40th and Berteau Avenues. Price,
$3,035.
F. Hansen to John C. Andersen: Hanson Court and Milwaukee Avenue. Price, $18,000.
Edward Loving to Charles L. Knudson: Ridgeway and Wabansia Avenues. Price, $2,400.
Anton M. Christianson to Solomen Feitler: Evans Avenue and 61st Street. Price, $8,000.
Mary K. Shealy to Frank K. Heydem: Bond Avenue and Cheltenham Place. Price, $2,300.
Hugh Cornell to Charles and Martin Serum: Trumbull Avenue and Kuron Street. Price, $4,000.
D. Haas to Bertel Nielsen: Washtenaw Avenue and Le Moyne Street. Price, $5,500.
W. A. Harris to Charles J. Petersen: West End and 50th Avenues. Price, $7,250.
Lois Stafand to Abraham Cabell: Irving Avenue and Polk Street. Price, $4,500.
Emily Anderson to Maria Johns: Fairfield and Schubert Avenues. Price, $6,000.
M. McDonald to Emma Jensen: Township 38, lot 18, block 3. Price, $5,000.
Herbert R. Johnson to H. L. Coulter: Oak Park, East Avenue Addition, lot 3, block 12. Price, $12,000.
Peter Rasmussen to G. Harding: Paulina and 61st Streets. Price, $2,000.
